arts.ttl: RB Leipzig and Borussia Mönchengladbach share spoils in stalemate
arts.sum: RB Leipzig and Borussia Mönchengladbach battled to a goalless draw in a match of two halves at the Red Bull Arena, with both goalkeepers making important saves to ensure parity. The hosts produced one more moment in the 84th minute when Kevin Kampl's long-range effort forced Nicolas into another flying save.

arts.ttl: Kleindienst upset by "wrestled chances" following Leipzig draw
arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach failed to score in a 0-0 draw with RB Leipzig on Saturday evening in the Bundesliga. About the lack of goals, Tim Kleindienst feels his side should have done better.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | RB Leipzig 0-0 Borussia Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: On Saturday evening, RB Leipzig and Borussia Mönchengladbach played out a dire 0-0 draw at the Red Bull Arena. After their poor performance in midweek, Leipzig looked to turn their…

arts.ttl: Leipzig drop points again as Gladbach hold Rose's men to a draw
arts.sum: RB Leipzig dropped valuable points at the top of the Bundesliga table for the second week in a row as they were held to a 0-0 draw by Borussia Mönchengladbach.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig predicted XI vs Borussia Mönchengladbach: Marco Rose faces defensive headache
arts.sum: RB Leipzig will look to return to winning ways in the Bundesliga this weekend after suffering their first defeat of the season, but they face a difficult game against Borussia…

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig vs Borussia Mönchengladbach preview: Host's look to regain form
arts.sum: Following their first Bundesliga loss of the season in their previous match, RB Leipzig will be eager to return to winning ways as they host Borussia Mönchengladbach at Red Bull Arena on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Leipzig win forgotten as Schmeichel stays in moment
arts.sum: Kasper Schmeichel stresses the importance of staying "focused on the here and the now" as he relishes the physical and mental demands of Celtic's busy schedule.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig provide squad update following long list of injuries
arts.sum: RB Leipzig have provided an update on their squad ahead of their fixture this weekend against Borussia Monchengladbach in the Bundesliga after suffering with numerous injuries throughout the past few…

arts.ttl: Leipzig duo ruled out of Gladbach clash
arts.sum: Lutsharel Geertruida and Castello Lukeba will not be available for RB Leipzig against Borussia Mönchengladbach.

arts.ttl: German legend takes Celtic swipe as RB Leipzig branded an embarrassment over Champions League calamity
arts.sum: The side currently sitting second in the Bundesliga left Glasgow after a chastening defeat at Parkhead
